title: CIFRA font
content:
hi,

Cifra is my new sans serif font available at t26.  
 [http://www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f\_id=951](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011214520/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=951 "http://www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f\_id=951")  
I really would like to know you opinion about it.

thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011214520im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cifra_5507.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Cifra\_font2.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011214520/http:/typophile.com/files/Cifra_font2.pdf) | 295.35 KB |
author: rui abreu

comments.content: Rui, is there a better way to view it than other than the tester at T-26? Overall it is nice. It reminds me of a few different typefaces, but some of the subtle nuances in the italic separate it. There are a few shapes which I would be tempted to correct, but overall it is a really nice sans.
yes, i have a pdf file but i don't know how to upload it...
Rui, click on 'edit' which should be in the black bar just above your first post. Once inside, scroll down a bit and you should see "Attach new file:". Try that.

Tiffany, thanks

you can now see the pdf.
